General.Name: Sebata Holdings Ltd
General.Description: Sebata Holdings Limited provides software solutions and ICT support services. It develops bespoke software solutions; and provides information technology services. The company was formerly known as MICROmega Holdings Limited and changed its name to Sebata Holdings Limited in November 2018. The company is based in Sandton, South Africa. Sebata Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Laird Investments (Pty) Ltd.
